domain.interfaces
Interface Logic

All Known Implementing Classes:
DinamicEnvironment, Environment, PerCoordinatesDinamicEnvironment, PerCoordinatesStaticEnvironment, StaticEnvironment, TiledDinamicEnvironment, TiledStaticEnvironment
public interface Logic

This interface is intended to make the game logic a bit faster to develop. Since a simple game only has a few states, they are all refered here.

Method Summary
 boolean isGameMenuifiable()
           
 boolean isGameMenuified()
          This method should implement the game menuified requirement checkings if the Game is menuified, a call to toDoIfMenuified() should be invoked.
 boolean isGameMultiStage()
           
 boolean isGameOver()
          This method should implement the gameover requirement checkings if the Game is over, a call to toDoIfOver() should be invoked.
 boolean isGameOvereable()
           
 boolean isGamePauseable()
           
 boolean isGamePaused()
          This method should implement the game paused requirement checkings.
 boolean isStageCompleted()
          This method should implement the stage complete requirement checkings.
 void toDoIfMenuified()
          This method should implement the menuified logic for the game.
 void toDoIfOver()
          This method should implement the game over logic for the game At last it should call gameOver()
 void toDoIfPaused()
          This method should implement the pause logic for the game
 void toDoIfStageCompleted()
          This method should implement the completed stage logic for the game
 

Method Detail

isGamePauseable

boolean isGamePauseable()
Returns:
a boolean value indicating if the game instance is pausable or not.

isGameOvereable

boolean isGameOvereable()
Returns:
a boolean value indicating if the game instance is overeable or not.

isGameMenuifiable

boolean isGameMenuifiable()
Returns:
a boolean value indicating if the game instance is menuifiable or not.

isGameMultiStage

boolean isGameMultiStage()
Returns:
a boolean value indicating if the game instance is multistaged or not.

toDoIfPaused

void toDoIfPaused()
This method should implement the pause logic for the game

toDoIfOver

void toDoIfOver()
This method should implement the game over logic for the game At last it should call gameOver()

toDoIfMenuified

void toDoIfMenuified()
This method should implement the menuified logic for the game. At last it should call showMenu()

toDoIfStageCompleted

void toDoIfStageCompleted()
This method should implement the completed stage logic for the game

isGamePaused

boolean isGamePaused()
This method should implement the game paused requirement checkings. if the Game is paused, a call to toDoIfPaused() should be invoked.

Returns:
true if the game is paused. false otherwise.

isGameOver

boolean isGameOver()
This method should implement the gameover requirement checkings if the Game is over, a call to toDoIfOver() should be invoked.

Returns:
true if the game is over. false otherwise.

isGameMenuified

boolean isGameMenuified()
This method should implement the game menuified requirement checkings if the Game is menuified, a call to toDoIfMenuified() should be invoked.

Returns:
true if the game is over. false otherwise.

isStageCompleted

boolean isStageCompleted()
This method should implement the stage complete requirement checkings. If the stage is completed, a call to toDoIfStageCompleted() should be invoked.

Returns:
true if the stage is complete.
